intro: Every masterpiece begins with a thought.
This is how we craft your legacy.

steps.title: Consultation & Budget
steps.desc: Unlike others, we start with your range. Whether you need a simple elegant finish or a heavy royal bridal look, we plan the materials to fit your budget first.

steps.title: The Khaka (Blueprint)
steps.desc: Before a single stitch is made, the design is born on paper. This is the 'Khaka'â€”the soul of the dress. We draft intricate patterns that trace the flow of the embroidery.

steps.title: The Tracing
steps.desc: The design is transferred onto the fabric using traditional methods. We select the finest silks and velvets, ensuring the foundation is as royal as the embroidery itself.

steps.title: The Golden Stitch
steps.desc: The fabric is mounted on the 'Adda' (wooden frame). Our master Karigars begin the painstaking work of Zardozi, adding gold wires, pearls, and sequins stitch by stitch.

steps.title: The Grand Reveal
steps.desc: The pieces are stitched together, lined with comfort, and fitted to perfection. The result is not just a dress, but a piece of art ready for your special day.

list.title: Bespoke Bridal
list.desc: One-of-a-kind Lehengas and Sherwanis designed exclusively for your special day. No mass production.

list.title: Designer Production
list.desc: Are you a boutique owner? Send us your tech packs. We handle sampling, sourcing, and bulk export quality manufacturing.

list.title: Restoration
list.desc: We restore vintage sarees and antique Zari work, preserving the memories of your ancestors.

list.title: Accessories
list.desc: Hand-embroidered belts, potli bags, badges, and shoe uppers to complete your brand's look.

services.tiers_subtitle: We adjust the materials to fit your price range.

tiers.title: The Royal Tier
tiers.subtitle: Heirloom Quality
tiers.desc: For brides who want the weight of tradition. We use the finest authentic materials.

tiers.title: The Elegant Tier
tiers.subtitle: Modern & Chic
tiers.desc: Perfect for cocktail sarees and evening gowns. High shine, lighter weight.

tiers.title: The Smart-Budget Tier
tiers.subtitle: Beautiful & Affordable
tiers.desc: Maximum visual impact, optimized for cost. We use clever techniques to lower the price.

about.story: Kanzima Couture is not just a brand; it is a collective of skilled artisans (Karigars). Located in Prayagraj, the heart of India's embroidery belt, we bridge the gap between ancient techniques and modern budgets.
about.philosophy: We believe luxury is about transparency. You know exactly what materials we use, and you pay for the craft, not the label.
